name: ADOPT
description: Represents blips that we think you should seriously consider using

name: TRIAL
description: For blips that we think are ready for use but not as completely proven as those in the Adopt ring

name: ASSESS
description: things to look at closely but not necessarily trial yet - unless you think they would be a particularly good fit for you

name: HOLD
description: for things (that even though they are accepted in the industry) we haven't had a good experience with
